org.radarbase.management.service

Class OAuthClientService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.management.service.OAuthClientService

  • @Service
public class OAuthClientService
extends java.lang.Object
    The service layer to handle OAuthClient and Token related functions. Created by nivethika on 03/08/2018.

      • findOneByClientId

        public org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.ClientDetails findOneByClientId(java.lang.String clientId)
        Find ClientDetails by OAuth client id.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client ID to look up
        Returns:
        a ClientDetails object with the requested client ID
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - If there is no client with the requested ID

      • createMetaToken

        public ClientPairInfoDTO createMetaToken(Subject subject,
                                         java.lang.String clientId,
                                         boolean persistent)
                                  throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                         java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                         org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        Creates meta token for oauth-subject pair.
        Parameters:
        subject - to create token for
        clientId - using which client id
        persistent - whether to persist the token after it is has been fetched
        Returns:
        ClientPairInfoDTO to return.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when token URI cannot be formed properly.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - when token URL cannot be formed properly.
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • getMetaTokenTimeout

        public java.time.Duration getMetaTokenTimeout(boolean persistent,
                                              Project project)
        Gets the meta-token timeout from config file. If the config is not mentioned or in wrong format, it will return default value.
        Returns:
        meta-token timeout duration.
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if a persistent token is requested but it is not configured.

      • createAccessToken

        public org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken createAccessToken(Subject subject,
                                                                                      java.lang.String clientId)
        Internally creates an OAuth2AccessToken token using authorization-code flow. This method bypasses the usual authorization code flow mechanism, so it should only be used where appropriate, e.g., for subject impersonation.
        Parameters:
        clientId - oauth client id.
        subject - subject-id of the token.
        Returns:
        Created OAuth2AccessToken instance.
